title: 泰坦尼克号2
body: 似乎是纪念铁达尼事件100周年，但又遇上了同样的诅咒、遭逢同样的命运。 On the 100th anniversary of the original voyage, a modern luxury liner christened "Titanic 2," follows the path of its namesake. But when a tsunami hurls an ice berg into the new ship's path, the passengers and crew must fight to avoid a similar fate.
